settings.heading: FAQ
settings.content: Common questions about Sloe Fit products, shipping, and the app.

settings.question: What makes Sloe Fit supplements different?
settings.answer: Transparent formulas with clinical doses. No proprietary blends, no fillersâ€”just ingredients that work, backed by research.

settings.question: Is the Sloe Fit app free?
settings.answer: Yes. The app is included with any Sloe Fit product purchase. Track workouts, manage your stack, and access training plans at no extra cost.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Orders typically ship within 1-2 business days. Delivery takes 3-5 business days within the US.

settings.question: Can I stack multiple products?
settings.answer: Yes! Our products are designed to stack. Check out our Bundles & Stacks page for pre-built systems, or build your own based on your goals.

settings.question: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
settings.answer: Yes. If you're not satisfied with your first order, contact us within 30 days for a full refund.
